root.name: The Boondock Saints Video Game
root.description: Announced during a panel at SXSW on March 11th, 2012, not much is known about the game beyond the developer Critical Mass Interactive. Sean Patrick Flanery, Norman Reedus and David Della Rocco are contributing there voices and involved in the creative process.Early infoCritical Mass CEO Matt Scibilia let out some early details about the game before it's official announcement. Development is said to be in it's very early stages, so all this is subject to change.Platforms: X360 PC for sure, PS3 possibleGameplay: Co-op shooterRelease format: Shooting for a retail release, but episodic download possible.
